message: Greetings! I'm offering a unique and valuable product for $1000000. While I cannot disclose specifics, I assure you it is of exceptional quality. This is my first sale, and I'm committed to building trust with my customers. I believe you will be very satisfied with your purchase.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your confidence in the product, I'd like to see some evidence of its quality before committing such a large sum. I'm sure you understand the risk involved in buying an unseen product, especially at this price point. Perhaps if you offer a refund or exchange policy, or if some of your previous customers could share their experiences, I would be more inclined to buy.  I'll be watching your sales record closely and may consider purchasing in the future if the data supports the quality claims you're making.

I'm committed to providing excellent value, and I'm willing to stand behind my product.  I believe in its potential to exceed your expectations.  This is my second offering, and I'm dedicated to building a positive track record. Consider this a chance to invest in a product with great potential.
